text: Anata gataga fushinjin'na mono to (senjo de) mieru toki wa,(kare-ra no) kubi o uchikire. Kare-ra no oku o korosu made (tatakai),(horyo ni wa) nawa o shikkari kake nasai. Sonogo wa tatakai ga owaru made nasake o hodokoshite hanasu ka, matawa minoshirokin o torunari seyo. Moshi arra ga o nozominara, kitto (o jibun de) kare-ra ni hofuku sa reyou. Daga kare wa, anata gata o tagaini kokoromiru tame ni (tatakai o meiji rareru). Oyoso arra no michi no tame ni senshi shita mono ni wa, kesshite sono okonai o munashi mono ni nasa renai
